description: Main source file for a Flutter-based to-do list application. Contains app initialization, theme setup, data models, and UI for task management including add, toggle complete, and delete functionalities.

classes.name: TodoApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up theme and home screen.

classes.name: TodoItem
classes.description: Data model representing a task with id, title, creation timestamp, and completion status.

classes.name: TodoHomeScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget managing the to-do list UI and interactions.

classes.name: _TodoHomeScreenState
classes.description: State object handling the to-do list logic and UI for TodoHomeScreen.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the TodoApp widget.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs the ThemeData used throughout the app.

methods.name: addTaskFromInput
methods.description: Adds a new task based on user input.

methods.name: toggleTaskCompleted
methods.description: Toggles the completion state of a task.

methods.name: deleteTask
methods.description: Removes a task from the list.

methods.name: _showSnackBar
methods.description: Displays a brief message at the bottom of the screen.

methods.name: _normalizeTitle
methods.description: Cleans up and trims task titles.

methods.name: _buildHeader
methods.description: Builds the header widget containing title and input controls.

methods.name: _buildEmptyState
methods.description: Builds widget displayed when no tasks are present.

methods.name: _buildList
methods.description: Builds the list view of current tasks.
